title: Smarsh Service Agreement - General Terms
summary: This document outlines the general terms and conditions governing the use of Smarsh services by clients. It details the process of agreement acceptance, the structure of the service agreement, and the rights and responsibilities of both Smarsh and the client. Key sections cover the provision of services, support resources, trial services, client obligations regarding data and account management, and the use of third-party providers and marketplace applications. The agreement also specifies payment terms, fee structures, and the handling of overages. Overall, the document serves as a comprehensive legal framework for clients engaging with Smarsh's software and services.
